DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of hemodialysis on the pharmacokinetics (PK) of JTZ-951 and to evaluate the safety of 2 doses of JTZ-951 in subjects with end-stage renal disease (ESRD) receiving hemodialysis
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Hemodialysis on the PK of JTZ-951 in Subjects With End-stage Renal Disease
DOC.criteria: Subjects who have ESRD and have been receiving maintenance hemodialysis for at least 12 weeks prior to the Screening Visit Body weight (postdialysis weight) greater than 45.0 kg and a body mass index between 20.0 and 40.0 kg/m2 (inclusive) at the Screening Visit Acute coronary syndrome (e.g., myocardial infarction) within 1 year prior to admission Uncontrolled hypertension at the Screening Visit or Day 1
